article: Dear friends, Do you  _  you are lucky when you are sitting in the bright  _  and having your classes or enjoying your nice food at home? Do you feel many children in Haiti are very  _  too? We know an earthquake happened in Haiti on January 12 ,2010. Many people died . Lots of children don't have enough  _  to eat, and they  _  go to school now. They need our help. So we'd like to collect  _  and clothes for them. You can donate your old pens, rubbers, rulers, pencil-boxes or old clothes. And you can also donate some  _  . We will  _  them to the children in Haiti. We hope to raise more than10,000 yuan, then we can help 50 students to go back  _  school. If you would like to donate things, please  _  us at 83301666. Thank you. Gao Shanand her classmates
